thread.section_title: Hotel Elysees Union - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Fantastic weekend in Paris - Review of Hotel Elysees Union, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DT66
title: Fantastic weekend in Paris
text:
My wife booked this hotel for 3 nights for my birthday.
We arrived about 9pm on Friday and check in was very quick and efficient.
We were given room 11 which was situated on ground floor in the courtyard. Room is spotlessly clean and had enough space. Mini bar was well supplied.
We did not experience any noise even though we were situated next to the courtyard. Weather was awful so maybe this helped with noise as no one would want to sit out in the rain.
The reception staff was very friendly and it was manned 24 hours a day.
Hotel was ideally located. We flew into CDG and got on the RER train into Chatellet des Halles. Only took 45 minutes. We then took metro to Charles de Gaile - Etoile. The view as we walked up the stairs and the Arc de Truimphe was right in front of us was perfect.
Only a 15 min walked down Ave Kleber and hotel was on a side street.
We will definitely return. We only paid Â£100 per night through Booking.com. Great value.
Trocadero and Eiffel Tower only 15 min walk.
Plenty of nice restaurants on Avenue Kleber.
